if anyone could let me know whats going on idk if its my webhost or what...

item.title: 718 vote4cash
item.dc:creator: @XXrRrXX XXrRrXX
item.description:
@XXrRrXX wrote:

It seems you cant connect to your SQL maybe you didnt fill it in right? Fill it like this:
jdbc:mysql://IP/DB, User, Pass

Read full topic
